```diff
+ import { useCallback, useEffect, useMemo, useState } from &#39;react&#39;;
+ import { Transition } from &#39;@headlessui/react&#39;;
+ import &#39;./CredibilityCarousel.css&#39;;
+ 
+ type CarouselImage = {
+   src: string;
+   alt: string;
+   width?: number;
+   height?: number;
+   label?: string;
+ };
+ 
+ type CredibilityCarouselProps = {
+   images: CarouselImage[];
+   autoAdvanceInterval?: number;
+ };
+ 
+ const DEFAULT_INTERVAL = 6000;
+ 
+ export default function CredibilityCarousel({
+   images,
+   autoAdvanceInterval = DEFAULT_INTERVAL,
+ }: CredibilityCarouselProps) {
+   const slides = useMemo(() =&gt; images.filter(Boolean), [images]);
+   const [activeIndex, setActiveIndex] = useState(0);
+   const [isPaused, setIsPaused] = useState(false);
+ 
+   const totalSlides = slides.length;
+ 
+   const goTo = useCallback(
+     (nextIndex: number) =&gt; {
+       if (totalSlides === 0) return;
+       const wrappedIndex = (nextIndex + totalSlides) % totalSlides;
+       setActiveIndex(wrappedIndex);
+     },
+     [totalSlides],
+   );
+ 
+   const handleNext = useCallback(() =&gt; {
+     goTo(activeIndex + 1);
+   }, [activeIndex, goTo]);
+ 
+   const handlePrevious = useCallback(() =&gt; {
+     goTo(activeIndex - 1);
+   }, [activeIndex, goTo]);
+ 
+   useEffect(() =&gt; {
+     if (totalSlides &lt;= 1 || isPaused) {
+       return;
+     }
+ 
+     const timer = window.setInterval(handleNext, autoAdvanceInterval);
+     return () =&gt; window.clearInterval(timer);
+   }, [autoAdvanceInterval, handleNext, isPaused, totalSlides]);
+ 
+   if (totalSlides === 0) {
+     return null;
+   }
+ 
+   return (
+     &lt;div
+       className=&quot;credibility-carousel&quot;
+       onMouseEnter={() =&gt; setIsPaused(true)}
+       onMouseLeave={() =&gt; setIsPaused(false)}
+     &gt;
+       &lt;div className=&quot;carousel-viewport&quot; role=&quot;region&quot; aria-live=&quot;polite&quot;&gt;
+         {slides.map((image, index) =&gt; (
+           &lt;Transition
+             key={image.src}
+             show={index === activeIndex}
+             enter=&quot;carousel-enter&quot;
+             enterFrom=&quot;carousel-enter-from&quot;
+             enterTo=&quot;carousel-enter-to&quot;
+             leave=&quot;carousel-leave&quot;
+             leaveFrom=&quot;carousel-leave-from&quot;
+             leaveTo=&quot;carousel-leave-to&quot;
+           &gt;
+             &lt;figure className=&quot;carousel-slide&quot;&gt;
+               &lt;img
+                 src={image.src}
+                 alt={image.alt}
+                 width={image.width}
+                 height={image.height}
+                 loading=&quot;lazy&quot;
+               /&gt;
+               {image.label ? (
+                 &lt;figcaption className=&quot;carousel-caption&quot;&gt;{image.label}&lt;/figcaption&gt;
+               ) : null}
+             &lt;/figure&gt;
+           &lt;/Transition&gt;
+         ))}
+ 
+         {totalSlides &gt; 1 ? (
+           &lt;div className=&quot;carousel-controls&quot; aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;
+             &lt;button
+               type=&quot;button&quot;
+               className=&quot;carousel-button carousel-button-previous&quot;
+               onClick={handlePrevious}
+               aria-label=&quot;Previous slide&quot;
+             &gt;
+               &lt;svg viewBox=&quot;0 0 24 24&quot; aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;
+                 &lt;path d=&quot;M15.75 5.25 9 12l6.75 6.75&quot; /&gt;
+               &lt;/svg&gt;
+             &lt;/button&gt;
+             &lt;button
+               type=&quot;button&quot;
+               className=&quot;carousel-button carousel-button-next&quot;
+               onClick={handleNext}
+               aria-label=&quot;Next slide&quot;
+             &gt;
+               &lt;svg viewBox=&quot;0 0 24 24&quot; aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;
+                 &lt;path d=&quot;m8.25 5.25 6.75 6.75-6.75 6.75&quot; /&gt;
+               &lt;/svg&gt;
+             &lt;/button&gt;
+           &lt;/div&gt;
+         ) : null}
+       &lt;/div&gt;
+ 
+       {totalSlides &gt; 1 ? (
+         &lt;div className=&quot;carousel-indicators&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;
+           {slides.map((image, index) =&gt; {
+             const isActive = index === activeIndex;
+             return (
+               &lt;button
+                 key={&#96;${image.src}-${index}&#96;}
+                 type=&quot;button&quot;
+                 className={&#96;carousel-indicator${isActive ? &#39; is-active&#39; : &#39;&#39;}&#96;}
+                 onClick={() =&gt; goTo(index)}
+                 role=&quot;tab&quot;
+                 aria-selected={isActive}
+                 aria-label={&#96;Show slide ${index + 1}&#96;}
+               &gt;
+                 &lt;span className=&quot;sr-only&quot;&gt;{image.alt}&lt;/span&gt;
+               &lt;/button&gt;
+             );
+           })}
+         &lt;/div&gt;
+       ) : null}
+     &lt;/div&gt;
+   );
+ }
```

</details>

</tool-use>

## Summary
- Rebuilt the credibility strip as a two-column glass panel with dedicated copy and carousel zones, wiring the buttons to the existing metro video and Times of India coverage link while spotlighting the three PM Modi kiosk photos.  
- Added a React carousel (`CredibilityCarousel`) powered by Headless UI transitions for smooth fade animations, keyboard-friendly dot indicators, and the requested previous/next arrow controls.  
- Created component-scoped styling to keep the carousel aligned with the Frog8 glassmorphism aesthetic.  
- Installed `@headlessui/react` so the carousel can leverage its transition primitives for accessible UI polish.

```1:74:src/components/CredibilityCarousel.tsx
import { useCallback, useEffect, useMemo, useState } from 'react';
import { Transition } from '@headlessui/react';
import './CredibilityCarousel.css';

type CarouselImage = {
  src: string;
  alt: string;
  width?: number;
  height?: number;
  label?: string;
};

type CredibilityCarouselProps = {
  images: CarouselImage[];
  autoAdvanceInterval?: number;
};

const DEFAULT_INTERVAL = 6000;

export default function CredibilityCarousel({
  images,
  autoAdvanceInterval = DEFAULT_INTERVAL,
}: CredibilityCarouselProps) {
  const slides = useMemo(() => images.filter(Boolean), [images]);
  const [activeIndex, setActiveIndex] = useState(0);
  const [isPaused, setIsPaused] = useState(false);

  const totalSlides = slides.length;

  const goTo = useCallback(
    (nextIndex: number) => {
      if (totalSlides === 0) return;
      const wrappedIndex = (nextIndex + totalSlides) % totalSlides;
      setActiveIndex(wrappedIndex);
    },
    [totalSlides],
  );

  const handleNext = useCallback(() => {
    goTo(activeIndex + 1);
  }, [activeIndex, goTo]);

  const handlePrevious = useCallback(() => {
    goTo(activeIndex - 1);
  }, [activeIndex, goTo]);

  useEffect(() => {
    if (totalSlides <= 1 || isPaused) {
      return;
    }

    const timer = window.setInterval(handleNext, autoAdvanceInterval);
    return () => window.clearInterval(timer);
  }, [autoAdvanceInterval, handleNext, isPaused, totalSlides]);

  if (totalSlides === 0) {
    return null;
  }

  return (
    <div
      className="credibility-carousel"
      onMouseEnter={() => setIsPaused(true)}
      onMouseLeave={() => setIsPaused(false)}
    >
      <div className="carousel-viewport" role="region" aria-live="polite">
        {slides.map((image, index) => (
          <Transition
            key={image.src}
            show={index === activeIndex}
            enter="carousel-enter"
            enterFrom="carousel-enter-from"
            enterTo="carousel-enter-to"
            leave="carousel-leave"
            leaveFrom="carousel-leave-from"
            leaveTo="carousel-leave-to"
          >
            <figure className="carousel-slide">
              <img
                src={image.src}
                alt={image.alt}
                width={image.width}
                height={image.height}
                loading="lazy"
              />
              {image.label ? (
                <figcaption className="carousel-caption">{image.label}</figcaption>
              ) : null}
            </figure>
          </Transition>
        ))}

        {totalSlides > 1 ? (
          <div className="carousel-controls" aria-hidden="true">
            <button
              type="button"
              className="carousel-button carousel-button-previous"
              onClick={handlePrevious}
              aria-label="Previous slide"
            >
              <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" aria-hidden="true">
                <path d="M15.75 5.25 9 12l6.75 6.75" />
              </svg>
            </button>
            <button
              type="button"
              className="carousel-button carousel-button-next"
              onClick={handleNext}
              aria-label="Next slide"
            >
              <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" aria-hidden="true">
                <path d="m8.25 5.25 6.75 6.75-6.75 6.75" />
              </svg>
            </button>
          </div>
        ) : null}
      </div>

      {totalSlides > 1 ? (
        <div className="carousel-indicators" role="tablist">
          {slides.map((image, index) => {
            const isActive = index === activeIndex;
            return (
              <button
                key={`${image.src}-${index}`}
                type="button"
                className={`carousel-indicator${isActive ? ' is-active' : ''}`}
                onClick={() => goTo(index)}
                role="tab"
                aria-selected={isActive}
                aria-label={`Show slide ${index + 1}`}
              >
                <span className="sr-only">{image.alt}</span>
              </button>
            );
          })}
        </div>
      ) : null}
    </div>
  );
}
```

## Next Steps
- Run `npm run build` to confirm the new dependency and carousel compile cleanly.  
- Smoke-test the homepage to ensure the carousel arrows, auto-advance, and external press link behave correctly across breakpoints.

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
**Investigating carousel image rendering issues**

I’m untangling why carousel images appear black, focusing on how Astro and React handle static image imports—whether they yield strings or objects with `.src`. It seems passing `.src` when the import is already a string could yield undefined `src` attributes, causing the black slides. I’m also checking CSS positioning, React Transition behaviors, and hydration effects for clues. There’s a lot to verify around image loading and auto-scroll timing!</details></think>

```diff
+             leave=&quot;ease-in duration-200&quot;
+             leaveFrom=&quot;opacity-100 scale-100&quot;
+             leaveTo=&quot;opacity-0 scale-95&quot;
+           &gt;
+             &lt;Dialog.Panel className=&quot;w-full max-w-5xl relative&quot;&gt;
+               {/* Close button */}
+               &lt;button
+                 onClick={onClose}
+                 className=&quot;absolute -top-12 right-0 text-white hover:text-[#a7d221] transition-colors duration-300 z-10&quot;
+                 aria-label=&quot;Close video&quot;
+               &gt;
+                 &lt;svg
+                   className=&quot;w-8 h-8&quot;
+                   fill=&quot;none&quot;
+                   stroke=&quot;currentColor&quot;
+                   viewBox=&quot;0 0 24 24&quot;
+                   aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;
+                 &gt;
+                   &lt;path
+                     strokeLinecap=&quot;round&quot;
+                     strokeLinejoin=&quot;round&quot;
+                     strokeWidth={2}
+                     d=&quot;M6 18L18 6M6 6l12 12&quot;
+                   /&gt;
+                 &lt;/svg&gt;
+               &lt;/button&gt;
+ 
+               {/* Video container */}
+               &lt;div className=&quot;relative w-full aspect-video rounded-2xl overflow-hidden bg-black shadow-2xl border border-[#a7d221]/30&quot;&gt;
+                 &lt;video
+                   className=&quot;w-full h-full&quot;
+                   controls
+                   autoPlay
+                   playsInline
+                   onEnded={onClose}
+                 &gt;
+                   &lt;source src={videoSrc} type=&quot;video/mp4&quot; /&gt;
+                   Your browser does not support the video tag.
+                 &lt;/video&gt;
```

Implemented a video modal that opens when "Watch Video" is clicked.

## What I Created:

1. **VideoModal Component** (`src/components/VideoModal.jsx`):
   - Uses Headless UI Dialog for accessibility
   - Dark backdrop with blur
   - Close button (lime green on hover)
   - Video auto-plays and closes on end

2. **VideoButton Component** (`src/components/VideoButton.jsx`):
   - Wrapper that manages modal state
   - Replaces the anchor tag with a button

3. **VideoModal CSS** (`src/components/VideoModal.css`):
   - Styling aligned with Frog8 design
   - Responsive for mobile
   - Lime green accents matching brand colors

4. **Updated index.astro**:
   - Imports the video file (`tvm2k_ad.mp4`)
   - Replaces the link with `VideoButton` component
   - Video opens in a modal overlay

Clicking "Watch Video" opens a centered modal with the Transigo kiosk video. The modal includes a close button and closes automatically when the video ends.

2. **Navbar hiding**: Added a `useEffect` hook that hides the navbar (`nav.nav-white`) when the modal opens and restores it when the modal closes.

When you click "Watch Video":
- The button shows as an outline (lime green border, transparent background)
- The navbar hides automatically
- The video modal opens
- When you close the modal, the navbar reappears

Refresh the page and test the "Watch Video" button to confirm both changes.
